He was recently signed to Arista Records for an official release of "Skechers"—his first original track. About SKECHERS USA, Inc. Based in Manhattan Beach, California, Skechers ( SKX ) - Get Report designs, develops and markets a diverse range of lifestyle footwear for men, women and children, as well as performance footwear for men and women. Skechers footwear is available in the United States and over 170 countries and territories worldwide via department and specialty stores, 3,575 Skechers Company-owned and third-party-owned retail stores, and the Company's e-commerce websites.
